attributes.action: Prevent Jamie Oliver from manipulating the sale of unhealthy food products.
attributes.background: Jamie oliver is a tv chef who has used his celebrity to attempt to have certain food items that are deemed unhealthy banned. This is a petition to prevent any further damage being done to our food culture by one man, and preserve the foods that we grew up with and enjoyed responsibly.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for people's individual campaigns.
